name: Fly Catcher (Erfan Dastournejad)
description: Fly Catcher is a part of our online UI course at UX Land. In this project, students learn practical examples of visual coding with Unity's BOLT platform. Also, students get a full video tutorial on how the different systems within the game work individually and concerning each other. As part of the project, we learned how to make web-GL applications for use on websites and this is how you got access to this project in itch.io. For more information visit UX-Land.com
